Package model.MainGame

Interface Game

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    OthelloGame
    public interface Game
    A simple turn-based game.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Game deepCopy()
      Create a deep copy of current game
      void doMove​(Move move)
      Perform the move, assuming it is a valid move.

    • Method Detail

      • isGameOver

        boolean isGameOver()
        Check if the game is over, i.e., there is a winner or no more moves are available.
        Returns:
        whether the game is over

      • getTurn

        Player getTurn()
        Query whose turn it is
        Returns:
        the player whose turn it is

      • getWinner

        Player getWinner()
        Get the winner of the game. If the game is a draw, then this method returns null.
        Returns:
        the winner, or null if no player is the winner

      • getValidMoves

        java.util.List<Move> getValidMoves()
        Return all moves that are valid in the current state of the game
        Returns:
        the list of currently valid moves

      • isValidMove

        boolean isValidMove​(Move move)
        Check if a move is a valid move
        Parameters:
        move - the move to check
        Returns:
        true if the move is a valid move

      • doMove

        void doMove​(Move move)
        Perform the move, assuming it is a valid move.
        Parameters:
        move - the move to play

      • getMark

        java.lang.String getMark()
        get current mark of game
        Returns:
        a string of mark

      • getOppositeMark

        java.lang.String getOppositeMark()
        get the opponent's mark;
        Returns:
        the string of mark

      • getOppositePlayer

        Player getOppositePlayer()
        indicate the second player in this game
        Returns:
        player who is opponent of current player in this game

      • deepCopy

        Game deepCopy()
        Create a deep copy of current game
        Returns:
        a deep copy of board, player, current turn
